commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.break=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.break
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.break matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.break.off","color":"blue"}}

first_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand=3}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.armor.energy.pulse.hand 1
